thread.title: Softtek and MEGA International Sign Partnership Agreement to Help Companies Succeed in Strategic Transformation
thread.title_full: Softtek and MEGA International Sign Partnership Agreement to Help Companies Succeed in Strategic Transformation

author: Karen Liedl
title: Softtek and MEGA International Sign Partnership Agreement to Help Companies Succeed in Strategic Transformation
text:
Softtek , founder of the nearshore industry and leading global IT services provider dedicated to creating value through technology, today announced that it has signed an agreement with MEGA International to support organizations in their enterprise architecture and governance, risk and compliance efforts, by combining strategic consulting and software solutions. The agreement will leverage Softtek’s experience in business transformation and IT consulting, as well as MEGA’s software solutions, to assist clients in connecting leading technology to business challenges. Softtek and MEGA will collaborate on sales and delivery of professional services and products. “The new digital marketplace is driving an unprecedented need for organizations to transform,” said Marcos Jimenez, CEO for Softtek USA and Canada. “Our partnership with MEGA will further strengthen Softtek’s IT Transformation offering to guide organizations towards the transformation into bimodal enterprises, enabling them to respond to market and environmental changes with grace.”
The partnership will help Softtek’s clients to navigate their entire IT architecture by leveraging MEGA’s innovative enterprise architecture tools that help reduce risk, optimize operations and facilitate business transformation in the digital world. MEGA’s clients benefit from Softtek’s global delivery and consulting capabilities to cover all aspects of IT transformation, from strategy through execution.
“The proven expertise of Softtek’s consultants will help our customers accelerate their business transformation initiatives,” explained Lucio de Risi, CEO, MEGA. “The broad range of business and IT areas where Softtek has special proficiency meshes extremely well with the knowledge and skills of our MEGA consulting team. Both companies will be able to deliver an even greater level of service to the companies that look to us to help them create a competitive edge.”
Softtek’s mature IT consulting services include governance, risk and compliance, mergers & acquisitions, global procurement and financial crime prevention. Softtek helps organizations maximize the use of their IT resources, develop a lean IT management approach, and increase the value that technology brings to the organization. Both Softtek and MEGA have been recognized by leading technology analyst firms such as Gartner for their world-class solutions and service.
Softtek Senior Vice President of Consulting Services Camila Casale concluded, “We are excited to offer IT organizations and business leaders the latest technology and help them to establish a cadence of modernization across their culture, tools, processes, and people.”
About MEGA:
MEGA International is a global software and consulting services company helping corporations and government agencies manage enterprise complexity by giving them an interactive view of their operations. Business leaders use MEGA solutions to gain the visibility and information they need to drive business and digital transformation. MEGA customers include Aetna, The College Board, Nissan and Walgreens. For years, the company has been recognized by prominent industry analysts as a leader with innovative business solutions in enterprise architecture and governance, risk and compliance.
About Softtek:
Founded in 1982, Softtek is a global provider of process-driven IT solutions with 30 offices in North America, Latin America, Europe and Asia. With 12 Global Delivery Centers in the U.S., Mexico, China, Brazil, Argentina, Spain and India, Softtek helps improve time-to-business-solution, lower costs of existing applications, deliver better engineered and tested applications, and produce predictable outcomes for top-tier corporations in over 20 countries. Through on-site, on-shore and it’s trademarked Global Nearshore™ service delivery models, Softtek teams with CIOs to constantly increase the business value of IT. Softtek is the creator and a leader of the nearshore industry. Visit http://www.softtek.com , follow @Softtek, connect with Softtek on LinkedIn and read Softtek’s blog.
